title: U.S. teens : most frequently accessed social networks 2019
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
summary: This statistic shows the Share of who in the teens use were most using social networks 2019 .
During the 2019 survey period , 24 % of respondents stated that they had most accessed Facebook , either via desktop or mobile internet connection .
gold: During an September 2019 survey , it was found that 25 percent of teens in the United States used Instagram the most out of all social networks.
This is hardly surprising , as U.S. teens rated Instagram among their favorite social network for the past few years.
In spring 2019 , 35 percent of teenagers ranked the photo-sharing app as their most important social network .
